ygData.subject: Re: Trying to add to the confusion
ygData.msgSnippet: I can tell you which quest gave me the tattered armor. If you d like. -Zikkin
ygData.messageBody:
I can tell you which quest gave me the tattered armor. If you'd like.

-Zikkin

>
